description: Bottom-right panel of the Quad layout. The Swedish front merges with the main defensive line near Jutas. Soldiers kneel to reload as officers shout new positions. The Russian vanguard advances through smoke and trampled crops, the sound of drums faint under cannon thunder.
narration: The first clash fades — the field now belongs to Jutas.
info: Page 6 – Battle Begins. PageType: 4). Scene (panel 4): Swedish retreat joins main line, Russians press forward through smoke.
